pages.title: Flame
pages.text: Cost: Lv1 = Spell + Flint and Steel / Lv2 = Spell + Fire Charge $(br2)Max Level: 2$(br2)XP Cost: Lv1 = 8 / Lv2 = 12$(br2)Your go-to for combat and cooking food. The flame spell has useful utility within and out of combat

When you cast the spell, a small projectile is cast from you. $(br)When the spell hits an entity, it will be lit on fire (The higher the level of the spell, the longer they will be on fire).$(br)If the spell hits a block, it will light it on fire, or if it has the ability to be 'lit' (E.g. Campfires), it will light them on fire
